subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Jeff Vinik, a minority owner of the Boston Red Sox, has agreed to buy the Tampa Bay Lightning, taking on the challenge of turning around a franchise that has struggled since winning the Stanley Cup in 2004.
snippet: Jeff Vinik, a minority owner of the Boston Red Sox, has agreed to buy the Tampa Bay Lightning, taking on the challenge of turning around a franchise that has struggled since winning the Stanley Cup in 2004.
